comment: The ONLY thing Professor Baidoo did right was making our tests "take home". Some classmates and I worked on all tests together with the same exact work and answers yet some how received different grades. You get to exempt the final if you have an A but if you have anything lower he says your grade is "a gambling game" when it comes to the final.

Prof. Baidoo was an amazing Calculus teacher! I was very nervous to take calc from what i had heard about other teachers, but he was great! Fall 2016 was his first semester and I personally feel like he did awesome! MUST GO TO CLASS TO GRASP CALC CONCEPTS!! There is homework every week, but just 2-3 due on Sunday night. Not a hard class if you try.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: I really do like Professor Baidoo but I do have difficulty in his class due to that he just runs through the lectures. Calculus is something that takes time. He goes very fast at his own pace and it is hard to keep up and you can not understand the material and get confused real fast. He does listen to class' opinions though!
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS
